name: Herb Butter Sauce
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh chervil leaves

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the shallots and the wine in a heavy saucepan. Cook over medium-high heat until the wine has almost evaporated. Add the cream and reduce by half. Add the butter quickly, one tablespoon at a time, whisking constantly. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the salt, pepper and herbs.
